---
format: 
    html:
        table-of-contents: false
        css: event-page-styles.css
page-layout: full
pagetitle: "TITLE"
# Single category (string) or multiple categories (array). While only first category shows on card (the top right label); all are displayed on actual event page.
categories: ['Discussion', 'Hacky Hour', 'ReproducibiliTea Journal Club', 'Workshop', 'Lecture', 'Symposium', 'Conference', 'Summer School', 'Panel Discussion Series','OSIM meetup'] 

# Event Information 
event:
  date: "MONTH DAY, YYYY"         # e.g. "September 24, 2026"
  end_date: "MONTH DAY, YYYY"     # e.g. "September 24, 2026", non-mandatory field
  time: "START-END CET"           # e.g. "14:00 - 17:00 CET"
  location:
    name: "BUILDING NAME, ROOM NAME"    # e.g. "LMU Main Building, Room 123"
    address: "ADDRESS"                  # e.g. "Ludwigstraße 25, 80539 München, Germany""
    map_url: "GOOGLE MAPS URL"          # e.g. "https://goo.gl/maps/xyz""
  format:
    type: "EVENTTYPE"               # e.g. "In-person", "Online", "Hybrid"  
    detail: "FORMATDETAILS"    # e.g. "In-person & Online", non-mandatory field
  language:
    primary: "English"
    primary-code: "en"
    detail: "(German Transcript)"    # other language details, non-mandatory field
  
# Registration and Materials
links:
  registration: "REGISTRATION LINK URL"   # e.g. "https://www.pretix.osc.lmu.de/lmu-osc/swc-20250324-Hum/"
  materials: "WORKSHOP MATERIALS URL"    
  workshop_website: "WORKSHOP WEBSITE URL"   # e.g. "https://lmu-osc.github.io/introduction-to-renv/"

# Event Description: appears in the Event card an optionally in the Event page itself
event_description: 
  - "SHORT DESCRIPTION OF THE EVENT. This will appear in the event card on the main Events page. Keep it concise and engaging to attract attendees. MAX 2-3 SENTENCES."

# Formatting for hosts, presenters, instructors, helpers, and organizers follows the same structure.

# Add as many instructors, presenters, hosts, helpers, or organizers as needed using the format below.
# The `url` field is optional for all roles.
# If only one person is involved, include a single `- name` entry.
# If a role does not apply to a particular event (e.g., no host or organizers), remove that entire field from the front matter.
# Note: Order of these fields does not matter.

instructors:
  - name: "INSTRUCTOR 1 NAME"
    url: "LMU OSC PROFILE OR PERSONAL WEBSITE URL"
  - name: "INSTRUCTOR 2 NAME"
    url: "LMU OSC PROFILE OR PERSONAL WEBSITE URL"

helpers: 
  - name: "HELPER 1 NAME"
  - name: "HELPER 2 NAME"

presenters:
  - name: "PRESENTER 1 NAME"  
  - name: "PRESENTER 2 NAME"

organizers:
  - name: "ORGANIZER 1 NAME"
  - name: "ORGANIZER 2 NAME"

host:
  - name: "HOST 1"
  - name: "HOST 2"

# Contact Information
contact:
  name: "CONTACT PERSON OR GROUP NAME"
  email: "CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS"
---

<!-- MANDAORY SECTION START  -->

<h1 class="fs-1 text-primary"> {{< meta pagetitle >}} </h1>

{{< include templates/_setup.qmd >}}
{{< include templates/_info_boxes.qmd >}}
{{< include templates/_register_button.qmd >}}
<!-- MANDAORY SECTION END  -->
